metadata.name: External item descriptions
metadata.description:
This mod displays detailed information about all items, trinkets, cards, runes and pills DIRECTLY onto your screen. Say goodbye to your browsertab with platinumgod open ;)
[h1][b]------------------FEATURES------------------[/b][/h1] - Displays information for ALL 552 Collectibles, 128 Trinkets, cards, Runes and Pills in the game, including afterbirth+ and all boosterpacks (#1 - #5) - Displays if an item is needed for a transformation - Displays the Name and Type (Active / Familiar) of any collectible - Displays how many charges an item has - Display one of 4 different Indicators around the inspected item - [b]Press F2 to hide/show the descriptions![/b] - Displays what the next payout of the Sacrifice room can be - Displays a description of the effect of dice-rooms - Fully customize-able including features like: ---- Custom language support ---- Disabling the descriptions, when Curse of the blind is active ([b]This is enabled on default[/b]) ---- Customizable position, width and scale of the Textbox ---- Modded item support! ---- Custom item descriptions support ---- Custom entity descriptions ---- and much more
-- Including the following additional languages: [b]FRENCH[/b](by Nicolas Delvaux), [b]SPANISH[/b] (by Arroyo Purroy), [b]PORTUGUESE[/b] (by Marcelino Cruz) and [b]POLISH[/b] (WIP, by Rickyy) Change the config.lua file to switch languages.
-- Click here for the [b]CHINESE[/b] version : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1290363695]EID Chinese Edition[/url] --
-- Click here for an alternative [b]CHINESE[/b] version : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=848295251]中文道具图鉴 Eid Chinese[/url] --
-- Click here for the [b]ITALIAN[/b] version : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=931392691]External Item Descriptions Italian[/url] --
-- Click here for the [b]RUSSIAN[/b] version : [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1552851879]External Item Description (Russian Language)[/url] --
[h1][b]For Afterbirth / Rebirth Version click here: [/b][/h1] https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/1079/external-item-descriptions
[h1]You can use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]"Mod config Menu"[/url] to customize this mod![/h1]
[h1][b]For further Configuration:[/b][/h1] [b]Windows[/b] 1. Go to ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\ 2. Open "config.lua" with any texteditor 3. Edit the Config 4. Save the file 5. Play the game
[b]Linux / Ubuntu [/b] Same as aboth but the path is: /home/%YourUsernameHere%/.steam/steam/steamapps/workshop/content/250900/836319872
[h1][b]Special Thanks to[/b][/h1] - PLATINUMGOD.CO.UK for providing useful item descriptions - r0_0t for the functionality to read pill effects and for implementing the modded item-Support - Nicolas Delvaux for creating an awesome french language pack - Lidia Arroyo Purroy for creating the amazing spanish spanish language Pack - Rickyy for creating the incredible polish language pack - Marcelino Cruz for creating the portuguese language pack - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/whytefang/]adc[/url] for creating a awesome new Languagepack and providing ideas for new functionalities
